articles.author: John Bacon, USA TODAY
articles.title: Historic heat wave sweeps across US; 50 million are under advisories - USA TODAY
articles.description: A historic heat wave continued its march across the nation Sunday as more than 50 million Americans sweltered under heat advisories.
articles.content: A historic heat wave in the West was forecast to roll eastward this week after Phoenix, Las Vegas and Denver joined a plethora of cities and towns posting record temperatures and more than 50 million… [+4140 chars]

articles.title: Crowds flock to former McDonald's outlet in Moscow as it reopens under new name - The Irish Times
articles.description: Logo of new ‘Tasty — Full Stop’ restaurants evoke golden arches of the American chain
articles.content:
Hundreds of people have streamed into a former McDonalds outlet on Moscows Pushkin Square as the restaurant reopened under a Russian owner and a new name.
